EmailTemplate.name: Jackie Happy Holidays 2017
EmailTemplate.subject: Legend Boats-Happy Holidays from Jackie
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.FirstName}
I want to wish you and your family a very happy holiday season!
Winter is upon us, but we are still full speed ahead in boat show planning and making sure our 2017 line-up is second to none!.
Legend Boats is sure to turn some heads for the 2017 model year, starting this January 20-29th at the Toronto International Boat Show. I know the boat show is an annual tradition for many boaters, so if are planning on coming to the show, please stop by and say hi! Hit me up for a water or coffee in our Legend lounge, I'd love to get to know you better! If you have any questions regarding your Legend Boat, please don't hesitate to call or email at anytime.
Our all new XTR series, additions to the Fseries, and our fantastic pontoon line-up will be out in full force for you to view.
If you know of any friends or family in the market for a new boat, I would love the opportunity to welcome them to the Legend family!
Jackie Carrigan Legend Boats Barrie jcarrigan@legendboats.com 705 417 6856
